mapper.insert: insert into t_user(userId, userEmail, userPhone, userPwd, userIdentity, userName, userGender,userBirthday, userAddress, qqOpenId, weChatOpenId, weiboOpenId, userIcon, userDes, companyId, userSalary, userCreatedTime, userStatus) values(uuid(), #{userEmail}, #{userPhone}, #{userPwd}, #{userIdentity}, #{userName}, #{userGender},#{userBirthday}, #{userAddress}, #{qqOpenId}, #{weChatOpenId}, #{weiboOpenId}, #{userIcon}, #{userDes}, #{companyId}, #{userSalary}, now(), 'Y');
mapper.update: update t_user u set u.userStatus = 'N' where u.userId = #{userId};
update t_user u set u.userStatus = 'Y' where u.userId = #{userId};
mapper.select:
select u.*, r.roleName, c.companyId, c.companyName from t_user u, t_user_role ur, t_role r, t_company c where ur.userId = u.userId and r.roleId = ur.roleId and u.companyId = c.companyId
limit #{beginIndex}, #{pageSize};

select u.*, r.roleName, c.companyId, c.companyName from t_user u, t_user_role ur, t_role r, t_company c where u.userStatus = 'Y' and ur.userId = u.userId and r.roleId = ur.roleId and u.companyId = c.companyId
limit #{beginIndex}, #{pageSize};
select count(*) from t_user u where 1 =1 and u.userStatus = 'Y'

SELECT roleName FROM auto_platform.t_role WHERE roleId IN (select t_user_role.roleId from auto_platform.t_user_role WHERE userId = (select t_user.userId from auto_platform.t_user where userEmail = #{email}))

SELECT permissionName FROM auto_platform.t_permission WHERE permissionId IN (SELECT t_role_permission.permissionId FROM auto_platform.t_role_permission WHERE roleId IN (SELECT t_user_role.roleId FROM auto_platform.t_user_role WHERE userId = (SELECT t_user.userId FROM auto_platform.t_user WHERE userEmail = #{email})))

select u.* from t_user u where userId in ( select userId from t_checkin where checkinId in ( select ck.checkinId from t_maintain_record m, t_checkin ck where m.checkinId = ck.checkinId and m.recordId in (#{ids})));
